Archive note: Originally published on frogsbrain.blogspot.com. Republished from an archived Wayback snapshot.

A wealth of useful BizTalk 2004 information can be found at Gille's WebLog.

  • The flat file strikes back: BizTalk 2004 parsing positional records

  • The return of the flat file: Using BizTalk 2004 flat file disassembler

  • Selecting the flat file disassembling schema dynamically

  • How do I reuse BizTalk 2004 maps outside of BizTalk?

  • Format of BizTalk 2004 assemblies: Maps

Another good resource that takes one of Gille's posts even further and demonstrates how to unit test a mapper.

  • Unit Test BizTalk Maps via Reflection

Automated Build & Deployment
  • Automated B&D of BizTalk 2004/6 via NAnt extensions.
